articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Apple launches $19.99 monthly AppleCare One subscription with coverage for three devices - TechCrunch
articles.description: Until now, people have had to enroll their Apple devices into separate AppleCare+ plans if they wanted additional coverage for their products beyond the standard warranty.
articles.content: Apple announced on Wednesday that it’s launching AppleCare One, a new $19.99 monthly subscription plan that includes coverage for up to three products. Customers can choose to add protection for more… [+2144 chars]
